groupbuilder.core.base module

Group Builder Base Module

This module defines abstract interfaces for group calculation functionality.

GroupCalculatorInterface(amount_people, ...)

Abstract interface for group calculator implementations.
class groupbuilder.core.base.GroupCalculatorInterface(amount_people, group_size)[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract interface for group calculator implementations.

This interface defines the core functionality required for any group calculator implementation in the system, ensuring consistent behavior across different implementations.

__init__(amount_people, group_size)

Initialize a new instance of the GroupCalculator class.

reset_groups()

Reset the groups and round to initial state.

create_groups()

Creates the groups, based on the round.

visualize_groups()

Print the groups in a readable format.

can_repeat()

Calculates the maximum number of unique groups that can be created.

get_current_groups()

Gets the current groups.

get_all_groups()

Gets all the groups from all rounds.

select_from_csv_file(file_path)

Reads the CSV file and prepares the data for selection.
abstract __init__(amount_people, group_size)[source]

Initialize a new instance of the GroupCalculator class.

Parameters:

  • amount_people (int) – The total number of people to organize into groups

  • group_size (int) – The desired size of each group

Raises:

  • ValidationError – If the amount of people or group size is invalid

  • AmountPeopleError – If the amount of people is less than the group_size

_abc_impl = <_abc._abc_data object>
abstract can_repeat()[source]

Calculates the maximum number of unique groups that can be created.

This method determines how many rounds of unique group assignments can be created given the constraints of the group size and total number of people.

Returns:

The maximum number of unique groups

Return type:

int

abstract create_groups()[source]

Creates the groups, based on the round.

This method generates new group assignments, ensuring that the same person is not placed in the same group multiple times across different rounds.

Return type:

None

Returns:

None

abstract get_all_groups()[source]

Gets all the groups from all rounds.

This method returns all group assignments across all rounds that have been created.

Returns:

All the groups

Return type:

dict

abstract get_current_groups()[source]

Gets the current groups.

This method returns the current group assignments for the active round.

Returns:

The current groups

Return type:

dict

abstract reset_groups()[source]

Reset the groups and round to initial state.

This method clears any existing group assignments and returns the calculator to its initial state.

Return type:

None

Returns:

None

abstract static select_from_csv_file(file_path)[source]

Reads the CSV file and prepares the data for selection.

This method loads people data from a CSV file to be used in group assignments.

Parameters:

Returns:
